titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the King at White-Hall, Novemb. 5. 1696. By Sir William Dawes, baronet, D.D. and chaplain in ordinary to His Majesty. Publish'd by His Majesties special command
titleStmt.author: Dawes, William, Sir, 1671-1724.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Speed, at the three Crowns, near the Royal-Exchange in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preach'd before the King at White-Hall, Nov. 5th.
Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles, California.

place.placeName: the three Crowns, near the Royal-Exchange in Cornhill
